title: Center Text on Page
description: In this task, you will create a simple page layout where a single text element must be placed exactly at the center of the screen. The text should remain centered even when the screen size changes.
problemOverview: You are given a blank page with no predefined layout. The goal is to position one text element so that it appears centered both horizontally and vertically on the screen at all times.
objectives: Place text at the center of the screen
requirements: The text must be centered horizontally
The text must be centered vertically
The layout must adapt to different screen sizes
constraints: Do not use fixed margins for positioning
The solution must work on all screen sizes
expectedOutcome: The text remains perfectly centered on the page regardless of screen width or height.

code.css: body, html {height: 100%; margin: 0;} .center {display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; height: 100vh; font-size: 2rem;}

title: Styled Button
description: In this task, you will design a button that is visually clear and easy to interact with. The button should look clickable and well-spaced.
problemOverview: You are given a page where a basic button exists without styling. Your task is to enhance the button so it looks visually appealing and user-friendly.
objectives: Make the button easy to click
requirements: The button must have padding
The button must have rounded corners
The text inside the button must be readable
expectedOutcome: The button appears clean, clickable, and visually distinct from the background.

code.css: .btn {padding: 10px 20px; background: #007bff; color: #fff; border: none; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 16px;} .btn:hover {opacity: 0.8;}

title: Background Color Toggle
description: In this task, you will allow users to switch the background color of the page using a button. Each click should alternate between two colors.
problemOverview: You are given a page with a button, but clicking it does nothing. The task is to implement logic that changes the page background color when the button is clicked.
requirements: At least two background colors
Background color changes on button click
constraints: Do not modify existing layout structure
expectedOutcome: Each button click alternates the page background color smoothly.

title: Dropdown Toggle
description: In this task, you will create a dropdown menu that opens and closes when the user interacts with it.
problemOverview: You are given a dropdown structure that is always visible. Your task is to control its visibility based on user interaction.
requirements: Dropdown should be hidden by default
Clicking the button should show or hide the dropdown
expectedOutcome: The dropdown opens and closes smoothly when the user clicks the toggle button.

title: Todo List
description: In this task, you will build a simple task management system where users can add and remove items from a list.
problemOverview: You are given an input field and a button, but the task list functionality is missing. Your job is to implement logic to manage tasks dynamically.
requirements: Tasks must appear in a list
Each task must have a remove option
expectedOutcome: Users can add tasks to the list and remove them individually.

title: Modal Popup
description: In this task, you will implement a modal window that appears over the page content and can be closed by the user.
problemOverview: You are given a modal layout, but it does not open or close. Your task is to control its visibility through user interaction.
requirements: Modal should appear above the page
Modal should close when the close button is clicked
expectedOutcome: The modal opens and closes correctly without affecting the page layout.
